verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:15
verses.text: And Saul’s servants said unto him, Behold now, an evil spirit from God troubleth thee.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:16
verses.text: Let our lord now command thy servants, which are before thee, to seek out a man, who is a cunning player on an harp: and it shall come to pass, when the evil spirit from God is upon thee, that he shall play with his hand, and thou shalt be well.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:17
verses.text: And Saul said unto his servants, Provide me now a man that can play well, and bring him to me.
